content: This article **needs additional citations for verification**. Please help improve this article by adding citations to reliable sources. Unsourced material may be challenged and removed. *Find sources:* "Singapore International School, Mumbai" – news **·** newspapers **·** books **·** scholar **·** JSTOR *(April 2020)* *(Learn how and when to remove this message)*International, co-educational school in Dahisar East, Mumbai, Maharashtra, India **Singapore International School, Mumbai** is a co-educational school, offering IB PYP ([International Baccalaureate Primary Years Programme](/wiki/IB_Primary_Years_Programme)), IGCSE ([International General Certificate of Secondary Education](/wiki/International_General_Certificate_of_Secondary_Education)) and IBDP ([International Baccalaureate Diploma Programme](/wiki/International_Baccalaureate_Diploma_Programme)) for both Indian and overseas students, though most are Indian or are of Indian origin. The school provides day [boarding](/wiki/Boarding_school), weekly boarding, monthly boarding and term boarding for students. - [DPS International School Singapore](/wiki/DPS_International_School_Singapore) - Indian school in Singapore - [List of schools in Mumbai](/wiki/List_of_educational_institutions_in_Mumbai#Schools) - School website Portals: - Singapore - Schools
title: Singapore International School, Mumbai
